name: PEM_S_BAT_RAPL_LIMIT_CHANGE_TPMI_MULTI_GROUP
summary: Verify if base_frequency excursion TPMI interface based event in multiple groups (any psys_pl1_msr_tpmi any pl2_msr_tpmi psys_pl2_msr_tpmi) occurred during 120 seconds all CPU stress due to power limit 1 after changing RAPL power limit to 20% of original value, command:   perf stat -o "$LOG_PATH"/out.txt -a \     -e "{pnp_excursion_monitor/$e_name1,frequency_threshold=$base_freq_mhz,duration=10/,pnp_excursion_monitor/$e_name2/,\ pnp_excursion_monitor/$e_name3/}" \     -e "{pnp_excursion_monitor/$e_name4,frequency_threshold=$base_freq_mhz,duration=10/,pnp_excursion_monitor/$e_name5/,\ pnp_excursion_monitor/$e_name6/}" sleep "$duration"
